transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha boliye sir.
Customer: Sir, bas ek baat karna tha aapse.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Sir, aapki taraf se service use nahi ki ja rahi hai, buylead vagera consume nahi kar rahe aap?
Executive: Ye kar rahe hai na sir, kar rahe hai.
Customer: Nahi sir, nahi ho rahi na, tabhi toh aapka concern raise hua hai na. Abhi dekhiye ye 50 se 1 lakh ki ye aapke paas buylead aayi hai Ram Darbar coin ki, Jalgaon, Maharashtra se. Aur ek ye aapki aayi hai NTRN gel, Beed, Maharashtra se, Delhi shift ki hai. Ek aapki padi hai 15 hour pehle.
Customer: Jalgaon Maharashtra ki nahi chahiye mujhe, Jalgaon Maharashtra ki nahi chahiye. Matlab Mumbai Maharashtra bhi chalegi, Mumbai Maharashtra, all India ki chalegi.
Executive: Aapko matlab kaha ki lead chahiye sir?
Customer: Mumbai se bhi chalegi, Mumbai ki chalegi. Jalgaon mein mera service available nahi hai, udhar nahi kar sakta mein. Idhar Jalgaon nahi kar sakte aap?
Executive: Jalgaon nahi kar sakta hu.
Executive: Accha sir, toh abhi ek kaam All India mein kar sakte hai, All India mein courier service Jalgaon aur Delhi nahi karte?
Customer: Jalgaon nahi karta mein.
Customer: Sir par sir ye Maharashtra mein hi hai.
Executive: Nahi Maharashtra mein hai lekin udhar se udhar mera service nahi hai.
Customer: Accha accha.
Customer: Sir ye aur bhi aur bhi sir buylead vagera padi hai. Aur aur pan India karte hai deal ya phir Maharashtra mein only Maharashtra mein deal hoti hai aapki?
Executive: Nahi nahi All India karte hai, All India.
Customer: Accha Kopargaon hai ye Maharashtra mein?
Customer: Kopargaon mein? Kopargaon mein?
Executive: Kopargaon Mumbai mein karte hai.
Customer: Ha toh Kopargaon toh karte honge na deal aap?
Customer: Matlab mein ye puch raha hu ki Maharashtra mein mujhe Kopargaon lagta hai area, us usme deal karte hai aap?
Customer: Kopargaon?
Customer: Ha ha Kopargaon.
Customer: Aur ek ye dekho Madhyapradesh ye ek deal thi aapki. Accha ek aapka Madhya Pradesh matlab Ram Darbar coin hai aapke paas ye sare coin hai aapke Madhyapradesh Madhyapradesh ki coin hai.
Executive: Nahi woh nahi woh nahi hai woh nahi hai mera. Dusre Ram Darbar wala coin jo aata hai 17-18 woh wala hai. Toh mujhe sir inquiry kaha aa rahi hai, mujhe lead nahi aa rahi hai, inquiry nahi aa rahi hai. Toh aap mujhe coin uska coin ka bhej rahe ho, mujhe jo inquiry hai NTRN chemical ka bhejo na. Mera main business jo hai NTRN chemical ka hai sir. NTRN chemical ho gaya.
Customer: Sir aapne ek product dalwaya tha na mere se aapne photo bheji thi na mujhe ye Ram Darbar coin ki.
Executive: Ha bheji thi woh bhi usme bhi deal karta hu lekin mera jyada jyada focus kiske upar hai chemical ke upar hai NTRN chemical ho gaya. NTRN chemical combo pack ho gaya.
Executive: Toh ye dekho NTRN gel and chemical ki ye padi hai, NTRN gel ki ye lead padi. Thik hai? NTRN gel chemical ye Kopargaon Maharashtra ki padi. Fir mein dikha du aapko NTRN gel ye Nagpur Maharashtra ki padi hai. Bahut si padi hai sir. Aur ye Ram Darbar coin ki bhi padi hai Madhya Pradesh ki 18 century jo aapka sikka hai na. Chalo mein consume karta hu unko mein mujhe buylead padi hai woh.
Executive: Ab sir coin chalegi ya buylead consume kariye. Fir mein aapka jo concern raise hua hai na aapka jo service aap use nahi kar rahe. Mein dekh leta hu aapne kab se buylead vagera consume nahi ki hai. Toh woh concern open hua hai isliye maine call kiya hai. Agar aapko koi dikkat aa rahi hai buylead mein buylead ko lekar ya koi product ko lekar toh aap mujhe connect kariye. Aapne abhi koi consume ki hai sir aaj? 9 tarikh ko ki, 9 tarikh ke baad sir aapne ek hafte ki buylead consume nahi ki na. Isliye phir aapka concern raise hua hai. Abhi aapne koi ki hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mein kuch kaam se bahar gaya tha. 8 din mein nahi tha toh uske wajah se consume nahi hui hogi.
Executive: Accha sir ye call sir ye rehta hai ki jaise sir aapko buyer direct call karta toh aapko call miss ho paati hai aapki.
Customer: Nahi dekho mere mere mere mobile mein do kya bolte hai do sim hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Barabar toh aapko aapko 38 call aayi hai, 38 call mein sir aapne 25 call miss kar di.
Customer: 25 customer ki call miss. Itni call nahi nahi aayi mujhe.
Executive: Are sir aayi hai dekho 26 se 1 tarikh ka jo 26 se 1 jo week raha hai na 26 November se leke 1 tarikh ka isme aapko 38 call aayi, 25 miss hui, 13 aapne call uthai hai. Abhi aapka kya hai 2 tarikh se 2 November se leke 8 November mein saat call aayi hai, ek bhi call aapne uthai nahi, sari miss ki hai. Fir iske baad se aapko call hi nahi aayi hai 8 tarikh ke baad se. Kyunki aap inactive the platform pe, aapne koi buylead bhi consume nahi ki. Toh abhi inactive ho gaya tha kya?
Executive: Haan inactive ho rahe the tabhi toh maine call kiya. 9 tarikh se 15 tarikh ke beech mein aapko koi call nahi aayi hai aapne koi buylead consume nahi ki. Ab aapne aaj buylead ek consume ki hai abhi. Abhi do teen buylead sir consume kar lijiye mein aap yaha se update kar deta hu. Aapko aapke active show hone lagenge. Thik hai? Buylead vagera aap na daily ka routine bana lijiye. Daily ek ek toh kam se kam consume kariye hi kariye.
Customer: Okay sir, okay.
Executive: Aur jis jis area ki buylead aapko consume karni hai jisme aap deal karte ho waha ki ek hi kam se kam buylead consume kariye chahe chhoti ho chahe badi ho. Waha ki jab buylead consume kar lenge na toh us area ki aapki buylead aane lagenge. Aur sabse jyada jis jis product mein deal karte ho us us product ki buylead consume kariye. Ye jo IndiaMART hai na pura AI based hai. Jis tarike se aap kaam karoge usi tarike se aapko return milega.
Customer: Thik hai sir, thik hai.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states service not being used.

- Not consuming buyleads.

- Inquiries are for coins, not chemicals.

- Missed many calls from potential buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of consuming buyleads.

- Executive updated the customer's profile.

- Executive explained how IndiaMART's AI works.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will consume 2-3 buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, missed calls, ai
